NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 COLEUS: My guess is Giant's Deep. 2 1 MELORAE: My guess is the sixth location. 3 2 PHLOX: The Quantum Moon was orbiting Giant's Deep! Coleus wins the phantom moon game again! 4 3 MELORAE: I do not believe in such coincidences! Coleus, did you leave a pair of eyes at the Quantum Moon locator? You have won too many games in succession! 5 3 PHLOX: Oh! Melorae, Melorae! The tentacled species are visiting the surface again! 6 5 PHLOX: Whenever Giant's Deep wins, the tentacled species come up to visit us! They must be happy to meet the Quantum Moon too! 7 6 MELORAE: I.. I have never noticed this trend before. Could the Quantum Moon's gravity be causing these water-composed species to rise to the surface? 8 7 COLEUS: I confess to having a pair of eyes at the Quantum Moon Locator, Melorae - I was curious when you would realize - but I must test Phlox's hypothesis at once! 9 8 MELORAE: Hah! My claim is founded! Nobody could so consistently know where the Quantum Moon is without a pair of eyes at the Quantum Moon Locator. LCJ EX1 1 LCJ EX2 7 LCJ EX3 9
